content.en: Phishing AI: Researchers have been investigating the use of deep learning algorithms to improve the detection of phishing attacks. They have developed various models, such as Deep Neural Networks (DNN), Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), and Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM), to detect phishing URLs and websites. These algorithms show promise in improving accuracy and reducing false positives in phishing detection systems.
content.da: Phishing AI: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af dyb læringsalgoritmer til at forbedre detektionen af phishingangreb. De har udviklet forskellige modeller, såsom dybe neurale netværk (DNN), konvolutionelle neurale netværk (CNN) og lang korttids-hukommelse (LSTM), til at opdage phishing-URL'er og -websteder. Disse algoritmer viser lovende resultater i at forbedre nøjagtigheden og reducere falske positive i phishingdetektionssystemer.
